description: Shows network interfaces traffic and filesystems usage of the VCSA

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("ifInOctets"), 1m) * 8 FROM "network" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "ifDescr" =~ /^$nic$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)

panels.description: The number of inbound/outbound packets which were chosen to be discarded even though no errors had been detected to prevent their being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. One possible reason for discarding such a packet could be to free up buffer space.
panels.title: Input/Output packets discarded

panels.description:
The number of inbound/outbound packets that contained
errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol.
panels.title: Input/Output packets errors

panels.description: Directory where the kernel images and boot loader configurations are stored.
panels.title: /boot

panels.description: Directory used when the system is out of memory to swap to disk.
panels.title: SWAP

panels.description: Directory where core dumps from VPXD process from the vCenter Server are stored.
panels.title: /storage/core

panels.description: Directory where vCenter Server and Platform Services Controller store all logs for the environment.
panels.title: /storage/log

panels.description: Stats, Events, Alarms and Tasks (SEAT) directory for VMware Postgres.
panels.title: /storage/seat

panels.description: VMware Netdump collector repository that stores ESXi dumps.
panels.title: /storage/netdump

panels.description: VMware Auto Deploy repository that stores the thinpackages used for stateless booting of ESXi hosts.
panels.title: /storage/autodeploy

panels.description: VMware Image Builder repository that stores the vSphere image profiles, software depots and VIB packages, such as driver VIBs and update VIBs.
panels.title: /storage/imagebuilder

panels.description: VMware Update Manager repository where patches and updates are stored for Virtual Machine and ESXi hosts.
panels.title: /storage/updatemgr

panels.description: VMware Postgres databases Write-Ahead Logging (WAL) location.
panels.title: /storage/archive

panels.description: VMware vTSDB Service Repository that stores the stats.
panels.title: /storage/vtsdb

panels.description: VMware vTSDB Service Repository that stores the logs of the service.
panels.title: /storage/vtsdblog

panels.description: Workload Control Plane service stage directory or software depot, this stores the binaries for install and update/upgrade.
panels.title: /storage/lifecycle

panels.description: The device mapper is a framework provided by the Linux kernel for mapping physical block devices onto higher-level virtual block devices.
panels.title: Device mapper

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "storage" WITH KEY = "hrStorageDescr" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$vcenter$/
list.label: File system
list.name: filesystem
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "storage" WITH KEY = "hrStorageDescr" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$vcenter$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "network" WITH KEY = "ifDescr" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$vcenter$/
list.label: NIC
list.name: nic
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "network" WITH KEY = "ifDescr" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$vcenter$/

title: VCSA Network & Storage
